description: Number of binary trees of height <= n.
references: T. K. Moon, "Enumerations of binary trees, types of trees and the number of reversible variable length codes," submitted to Discrete Applied Mathematics, 2000.
links: Index entries for sequences of form a(n+1)=a(n)^2 + ...
formula: a_n = d_n + a_{n-1} (d_n is the number of binary trees of depth exactly n, A001699).a(n) = A003095(n+2)-2 = A004019(n+1)-1 = a(n-1)^2+4*a(n-1)+3
author: Todd K. Moon (Todd.Moon(AT)ece.usu.edu), Aug 02 2000
